pkgmetadata.longdescription: Memory-Based Learning in Spectral Chemometrics // Functions for dissimilarity analysis and memory-based learning (MBL, a.k.a local modeling) in complex spectral data sets. Most of these functions are based on the methods presented in Ramirez-Lopez et al. (2013) doi:10.1016/j.geoderma.2012.12.014.
